person.name: Dwi Prabowo
person.profile: I have been working for more than 5 years as a Programmer, 3.5 years as a Web Developer and as my current favorite. Mainly technologies that I use are HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP (CI, Laravel), Git. I also had the experiences developing application for mobile devices, creating and building a startup team, and developing some desktop softwares.

job.title: Programmer
job.desc: Entered as a PHP Programmer, have been working for at least 3 projects using laravel framework.

job.title: Web Developer
job.desc: As a Web Developer, I have the responsibilities to develop some web based applications, maintain the frontend + backend, do some researches and implement those to the projects.
